channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiADCManager, FortiADC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiADCManager, FortiADC

item.title: CVE-2021-24024|2024-08-03T19:14:10.105Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiadcmanager%2C%20fortiadc
item.description: A clear text storage of sensitive information into log file vulnerability in FortiADCManager 5.3.0 and below, 5.2.1 and below and FortiADC 5.3.7 and below may allow a remote authenticated attacker to read other local users' password in log files.
